document_data.name: Fire Charm
document_data.mainbody: '''''Fire charm''''' was an [[Arcane magic|arcane]] [[wizard]] [[spell]] from the [[enchantment]] school that allowed the caster to transform a normal source of fire into a visual trap.
document_data.Effects: The spell caused a shimmering aura of color to envelop the fire, causing any who looked upon it to be charmed into remaining motionless and gaze into the fire for the spell's duration.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, the spell required as a [[material component]] a thin piece of multi-colored [[silk]] to cast. The silk was tossed onto the fire and consumed during the casting.
document_data.History: [[Firewalker]]s, [[specialty priest]]s devoted to [[Kossuth]], used the ''fire charm'' spell.
